text:
Movie m 375 ka galat use se zyada focus society ke pressure par h.. which is
not true.. last year kitne hi cases aaye the Bollywood industry ke under
[#metoo](http://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%23metoo) but na koi
movement hui na kisiko arrest Kiya gya na hi public ko aaj yaad accused logg
yaad bhi h.. infact nirbhaya and asifa ki movement ke alava kabhi koi public
movement hui hi nhi India m asking for women safety.. na vo logo ke ly
important h na government ke ly.. India m aaj bhi marital rape ke ly koi
punishment nhi h..90% rape ke case report hi nhi hote coz mostly koi
rishtedaar hota h..plus ab death penalty bhi h toh sab ladki ko hi smjha dete
h and report hi nhi krte.. Jo logg report krte h usme bhi bss 1-2% logo ko
punishment milti h.. rape chahe women ka ho men ka ho ya kisi transgender
ka..usko sensitivity se handle karna chaheye.. galat case krne valo ke against
punishment honi chaheye and hoti bhi h..kabhi judiciary ne logo ke pressure m
aa Kar galat judgment nhi di.. India jsi country m Hume Orr public movement ki
zarurat h.. na sirf rape cases m balki Harr injustice ke against.. unko khrab
light m dikhane vali ye movie society ki soch ke ly bhot dangerous h
label: CAG
text_pp: Movie m 375 ka galat use se zyada focus society ke pressure par h .. which is not true .. last year kitne hi cases aaye the Bollywood industry ke under  [# metoo ]( but na koi movement hui na kisiko arrest Kiya gya na hi public ko aaj yaad accused logg yaad bhi h .. infact nirbhaya and asifa ki movement ke alava kabhi koi public movement hui hi nhi India m asking for women safety .. na vo logo ke ly important h na government ke ly .. India m aaj bhi marital rape ke ly koi punishment nhi h .. 90 % rape ke case report hi nhi hote coz mostly koi rishtedaar hota h .. plus ab death penalty bhi h toh sab ladki ko hi smjha dete h and report hi nhi krte .. Jo logg report krte h usme bhi bss 1-2 % logo ko punishment milti h .. rape chahe women ka ho men ka ho ya kisi transgender ka .. usko sensitivity se handle karna chaheye .. galat case krne valo ke against punishment honi chaheye and hoti bhi h .. kabhi judiciary ne logo ke pressure m aa Kar galat judgment nhi di .. India jsi country m Hume Orr public movement ki zarurat h .. na sirf rape cases m balki Harr injustice ke against .. unko khrab light m dikhane vali ye movie society ki soch ke ly bhot dangerous h

character ko dekh kar aap nashedi druggist gunda tharki badmash apne se bado
ki ijjat mat karo hamesha gusse me raho college me sir logo se batamiji karo
ye achhcha hai.kya topper log aise hote hai?kya aise chor logo ka mbbs me
selection hota hai?kya doctor log aise gunde hote hai?saala college ko apne
baap ki jaagir bana kar rakha hai pura college uska gulam hai.kabir singh ke
character se suru se lekar last tak nafrat ke alava kuchh nahi nikalta aur

text:
@Inocent Hydrogen Haan to Maine kab kaha, aurten purush ka dhyan nahi rakhti.
Main to ye keh hi raha hoon ki samaj me mahila aur purush ki saman bhagidaari
hai. Lekin ye tum ho jo keh rahi ho ki mujhe kisi purush ki jaroort nahi hai
may be including your father.Main to khud ke liye saman rup se credit deta
hoon maa aur pita dono ko.  
Maine kab kaha ki rapist ko ya kisi galat aadmi ko saja nahi milni chahiye.
Use to kari se kari saja milni chaiye. Uske liye to kitne men fight ladte
hain. Maine to tumhe naam bhi bataya.  
Arunachal murugnathm, Harish sadni, sakti vahini, srk, Akshay these all men
fight for women and speak for women.  
Main bhi yahi keh raha hoon mahilaaon pe atyachar aur balatkaar par band hone
chahiye. Uske liye purush aaj mahilaaon se bhi jyada lad rahe hain.  
Lekin harek sikke ke do pehlu hote hain. Ab mahilaaon ke sath purush ke sath
jo galat ho raha hai uska kya. False rape case, false dowry case me ladko ke
sath itna atyachar hota hai uska kya, ladko ki job chali jati hai, samaj use
hamesha galat najar se dektha hai uska kya, kai log to is chakkar me suicide
tak kar lete hain behen uska kya.  
Is tarah ki mahilaaon ke sath aapke hisaab se kuch nahi hona chahiye taki ye
phir se aisa kar sake.  
Samaj me mahila aur purush dono samman ke hakdaar hain. Lekin purush ki bejjti
kana logo ke liye pride ki baat hoti hai. Aisa sirf ladkiyan hi nahi karti
ladke bhi dusre ladke ke sath karte hain.  
Are you serious jo tum ye keh rahi ho ki section 375 movie samaj me hatred
phaila raha hai. Kyon ye male perspective ko dikta hai. Ye to yahi baat hui ki
main bolun ki Pink movie samaj me hatred phaila raha hai. Kisi men ne pink
movie ke bare me aisa nahi bola par tumhe section 375 hatred failane wali
movie lagati hai. Wow madam. Mujhe to dono movie equal scale pe achhi lagi
kyonki dono movie me dikhayi gayi baatein aaj ke samaj ke hissa hai. Par tum
nahi samjhogi kyonki tum har chiz ko sirf aur sirf feminist ke chasme se dekti
ho.  
Rahi baat border ki to border ki jarurat sabko padti hai. Taki koi parosi
hamare ijajat ke bina andar na aa sake. Isme mahila aur purush ki koi baat
nahi hai. Aur apne hak ki ladaai ladna koi ashaanti phailana nahi hai. Kya
Rani lakshmi bai ne apne hak ki ladai nahi ladi thi. Hum sabhi purush aur
mahila unko respect karte hain. Yahi chiz Army bhi border par karti hai. Par
mujhe pata hai koi bhi feminist army ki respect nahi karti. It's ok.  
Aur antim baat se main thoda sa sehmat hoon ki aurton ki banayi duniya me
shanti hoti. May be hoti.  
Lekin is ashanti me sirf mahila hi nahi purushon ne mahilaaon ke liye atyachar
jhela hai.  
Good bye-sister.All the best for your future.
label: CAG
